title: Healthcare Admin Assistant / Medical Scribe
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Medical Scribe to support our urgent care center by performing detailed medical charting and documentation tasks. The ideal candidate should be familiar with eClinicalWorks (ECW) and skilled in navigating electronic health records to accurately update patient charts. A key part of this role involves reviewing shorthand or brief notes from providers and converting them into clear, comprehensive clinical documentation for internal records and insurance purposes. Strong attention to detail, a good understanding of medical terminology, and the ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced healthcare environment are essential. This position helps ensure smooth clinical operations by supporting providers and staff with timely, accurate, and well-documented medical records.
